Signatures of Heat conduction in semi-collisional Astrophysicsal Plasmas Developing Transport Theory in the presence of Kurtotic Suprathermal Tails in Finite Knudsen number plasmas Kurtosis Formation in semi-collisional Astrophysical Plasmas New Models of Solar Corona and Stellar Wind Expansions Diagnostics of Magnetic Reconnection in Space Plasmas Students develop skills in: writing codes in C, Fortran and IDL, and numberical methods Employment opportunities are postdoc positions at universities and national labs
